name: Vartalaap
description: Vartalaap is a smart platform built on the WhatsApp Business API, designed to help businesses streamline their communication. It enables message broadcasting, automates notifications, and enhances customer service. Trusted by companies of all sizes, Vartalaap also offers solutions for service providers, media agencies, resellers, and technology enablers through the WhatsApp Cloud API.
focus_areas: WhatsApp Engagement Platform: Simplifies message broadcasts, live chats, and AI-powered chatbots for businesses.
WhatsApp Cloud API and iframe for Tech Businesses: Provides seamless API solutions tailored to tech companies.
AI-Driven Click-to-WhatsApp (CTWA): Leverages AI for smarter customer interactions through Click-to-WhatsApp features.
